definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The females were able to kill hosts by stings.
sentences.chinese: 而且成蜂取食能夠致死寄主。

sentences.english: The influences of semiochemicals on host selection behavior of natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 信息化合物對天敵選擇寄主行爲的影響。

sentences.english: No original relation was found between the xenoliths and the host basalt.
sentences.chinese: 上述捕虜體均與寄主玄武岩無成因關係。

sentences.english: An infection thread is formed by the cytoplasm of the host cell.
sentences.chinese: 侵染線是由寄主細胞的細胞質形成的。

sentences.english: Parasitoids is an important factor in regulating insect population dunamics.
sentences.chinese: 寄生蜂是調節寄主害蟲種羣數量的一個重要因子。

sentences.english: The fungi can also increase their hosts tolerance to drought and other soil stresses.
sentences.chinese: 真菌也能提高寄主植物對乾旱和其它逆境的忍耐能力。

sentences.english: Density and distribution of rodents with the relationship of rodents and its ectoparasite are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並調查了鼠類分佈情況和寄生蟲與寄主的關係等。

sentences.english: Research advances of nutrient requirement and metabolism of black porgy;
sentences.chinese: 研究了白蠟蟲營養需求與寄主植物營養含量關係。

sentences.english: This shows that in female Tetrastichus sp. , there were no significant discrimination ability in parasitized and unparasitized pupae.
sentences.chinese: 表明齧小蜂雌蜂對已寄生寄主蛹無明顯的辯別能力。

sentences.english: Many insects use crucifers as hosts.
sentences.chinese: 許多昆蟲以十字花科植物爲寄主。

sentences.english: The morphological variations of B. tabaci are correlated with the structure of the host leaf.
sentences.chinese: 煙粉蝨的形態變異與寄主葉片的結構相關。

sentences.english: Its tendrils curl around the stem of the host plant.
sentences.chinese: 它的卷鬚纏繞在寄主植物的莖上。

sentences.english: The fine-grained diorite enclaves in granites and their host rocks come from the same magma source.
sentences.chinese: 花崗岩中的細粒閃長質包體與寄主岩石屬於同源岩漿。

sentences.english: Gradual physiological adaptation of the leafminer larvae to the novel hosts was widening their host plant range.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了多食性斑潛蠅寄主植物範圍擴大的原因。

sentences.english: Insect immunity is a defense mechanisms against attack by parasitoids.
sentences.chinese: 昆蟲免疫是寄主昆蟲抵禦寄生物侵襲的一種防衛機制。

sentences.english: The roots of sandalwood saplings attach themselves to the root of the host plant with the help of haustoria.
sentences.chinese: 檀香樹苗的根部附着到與寄主植物的根系吸器的幫助。

definition: to live in or on another organism as a parasite/to live by taking advantage of others/parasitism/parasitic
imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
the young (unborn or newborn) of an animal/larva
